---
title: "ES6 Recursive Imports"
resources:
  - test-2.js
  - bar.js
---

We also support ES6 recursive imports, but for now you have to specify
the javascript resources manually. See [test-2.js](test-2.js).

```{observable}
import { v1, v2 } from "./test-2.js";
```

```{observable}
v1()
v2()
```
